description:
Professional tool for decrypting SQL Server objects 

dbForge SQL Decryptor is a free tool designed to decrypt different types of SQL Server objects. It works with encrypted definitions of stored procedures, views, functions, and triggers. The decryption is simple – there is no need for specific T-SQL knowledge. You need only to point to the object and launch the automatic decryption process. 

SQL Decryptor supports Unicode and treats all national symbols in decrypted scripts correctly. The decrypted objects can be saved separately to files. A separate SQL editor allows for altering the codes of objects. 

With the help of this solution, database specialists can recover the original T-SQL code of any object, even if the source code is not available anymore.

The Decryptor tool is a part of the SQL Tools package and a stand-alone mini-tool.
summary: Professional tool for decrypting SQL Server objects
author: Devart
